## Storage\_2 interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Storage extends KeyValueStore 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [KeyValueStore](./stentor-models.keyvaluestore.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [createdTimestamp](./stentor-models.storage_2.createdtimestamp.md) | number | When the storage was created. This can be used to keep track of when we first met the user.<!-- -->Time is stored as number of milliseconds elapsed since the UNIX epoch. |
|  [currentAudioHandler?](./stentor-models.storage_2.currentaudiohandler.md) | [Handler](./stentor-models.handler.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The current handler that is playing audio. |
|  [currentHandler?](./stentor-models.storage_2.currenthandler.md) | [Handler](./stentor-models.handler.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The current handler of intents &amp; events. |
|  [history?](./stentor-models.storage_2.history.md) | History | <i>(Optional)</i> Limited history for the user, used to store media they are in the middle of listening to.<!-- -->Can be used to store other historical data in the future, such as previous responses they have heard.<!-- -->NOTE: We might want to make history required on storage. |
|  [lastActiveTimestamp?](./stentor-models.storage_2.lastactivetimestamp.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> When the last time we updated the storage was. This can be used to keep track of when we last saw the user.<!-- -->Time is stored as number of milliseconds elapsed since the UNIX epoch. |
|  [piiToken?](./stentor-models.storage_2.piitoken.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The PII information key (pii token) |
|  [previousHandler?](./stentor-models.storage_2.previoushandler.md) | [Handler](./stentor-models.handler.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The previous handler before the current |
|  [previousIntent?](./stentor-models.storage_2.previousintent.md) | [Intent](./stentor-models.intent.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The previous intent before the current |
|  [previousResponse?](./stentor-models.storage_2.previousresponse.md) | Response | <i>(Optional)</i> The previous response given to the user. |
|  [sessionStore?](./stentor-models.storage_2.sessionstore.md) | [SessionStoreData](./stentor-models.sessionstoredata.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Session raw data that is used to create the session store |
|  [unknownInputs?](./stentor-models.storage_2.unknowninputs.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Number of consecutive InputUnknown requests received from the user |
